org.apache.hadoop.metrics

Class MetricsServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.hadoop.metrics.MetricsServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class MetricsServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    A servlet to print out metrics data. By default, the servlet returns a textual representation (no promises are made for parseability), and users can use "?format=json" for parseable output.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      (package private) static class  MetricsServlet.TagsMetricsPair
      A helper class to hold a TagMap and MetricMap.

      (package private) Map<String,Map<String,List<MetricsServlet.TagsMetricsPair>>> makeMap(Collection<MetricsContext> contexts)
      Collects all metric data, and returns a map: contextName -> recordName -> [ (tag->tagValue), (metric->metricValue) ].

    • Method Detail

      • makeMap

        Map<String,Map<String,List<MetricsServlet.TagsMetricsPair>>> makeMap(Collection<MetricsContext> contexts)
                                                               throws IOException
        Collects all metric data, and returns a map: contextName -> recordName -> [ (tag->tagValue), (metric->metricValue) ]. The values are either String or Number. The final value is implemented as a list of TagsMetricsPair.
        Throws:
        IOException
